DOC.brief_summary: A single center pilot study determine protective effect RhuMAB-E25 airway physiology biology allergic asthmatic undergo bronchoprovocation methacholine . The primary study objective determines protective impact RhuMAB-E25 airway inflammation reflect exhaled nitric oxide ( NO ) level allergic asthmatic . The secondary objective determines protective effect rhuMAB E25 airway bronchoconstriction reflect Provocative Concentration methacholine cause 20 % fall FEV1 ( PC20 ) methacholine challenge testing .
DOC.brief_title: Role RhuMab-E25 Reducing Exhaled Nitric Oxide ( NO ) Allergic Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: This single center prospective , open-label study . Eligible subject undergo two baseline measurement exhale Nitric Oxide ( NO ) methacholine challenge test least one week apart . All subject receive treatment RhuMAB-E25 open label fashion day 0 , week 4 8 , undergo methacholine challenge NO measurement screening/baseline , week 0 , 6 , 12 . Complete Blood Count ( CBC ) do screening/baseline , week 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 , week 12 . For woman childbearing potential , screening pregnancy test do . All statistical analysis occur conclusion study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must least 18 year age , Must FEV1 > 70 % predict , Must evidence bronchial hyperreactivity methacholine define methacholine provocation cause 20 % great fall FEV1 ( PC20 ) < 8 mg/ml Use inhale steroid permit ; however , change inhale steroid dosage permit duration study Must normal platelet count , Must willing competent sign consent form Subjects allergic asthma exclude . Subjects ER visit upper respiratory infection within last six week exclude . Subjects tobacco use within past year > 10 pack year history tobacco use exclude . Subjects serum IgE level less 30 great 700 Iu/mL exclude . Subjects require oral steroid use exclude . Subjects weigh < 30 kg > 150 kg exclude , subject baseline IgE level great 300 may exclude , depend weight Pregnant nursing female exclude .
